name: part_001
file: tmp_AZKi - 【3D LIVE】SPECiAL LiVE -NON FiCTiON- 【youtube music weekend】 [NDYaVPFVtzk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: AZKi performs the song 'Ningen Goukaku' (Human Qualification) on a 3D stage with dynamic on-screen typography.
Short MC transition where AZKi hypes up the audience for the next song.
AZKi performs the song 'Fake. Fake. Fake.' with energetic choreography.

subtitles.original: …素晴らしき世界
subtitles.english: ...A wonderful world

subtitles.original: イエスと言えば人間合格
subtitles.english: Say "Yes" and you're a human qualification

subtitles.original: 笑えもっと　どんな顔だったっけ
subtitles.english: Smile more, what kind of face was it again?

subtitles.original: 心のうちと鼓動
subtitles.english: The heart within and its beat

subtitles.original: 非合法だ　聞かせて
subtitles.english: It's illegal, let me hear it

subtitles.original: 素晴らしき世界
subtitles.english: A wonderful world

subtitles.original: ノーと言えば人間降格
subtitles.english: Say "No" and you're a human demotion

subtitles.original: 素敵巧妙なシナリオだったっけ
subtitles.english: Was it a wonderful, clever scenario?

subtitles.original: 終わりは突然に
subtitles.english: The end comes suddenly

subtitles.original: そして淡々と　過ぎて朽ちていく
subtitles.english: And calmly, it passes and decays

subtitles.original: くだらない日々は過ぎ　そう過ぎてゆく
subtitles.english: Worthless days pass, yes, they pass by

subtitles.original: そう決められたルールに
subtitles.english: To the rules decided like that

subtitles.original: そう従って　楽になって
subtitles.english: Following them, getting easier

subtitles.original: 偽物ばかりすべて
